c74object.name: spat5.boids
c74object.description: spat5.boids is a bird flight and animal flock simulator. It is adapted from the legacy boids3d object.

attribute.name: initwith
attribute.description:
The initwith attribute can be used to specify the initial state of the object. You should provide a list of comma-separated OSC commands. The list of messages should be quoted (with double quote character "). This is similar to sending the list of commands via loadbang or loadmess.
Have a look at the spat5.tuto-osc-3.maxpat example for further details.
Note that the initwith attribute cannot be set via message, attrui or inspector; it must be typed directly within the object box.

method.name: /move
method.description: move the boids and output their now position.
method.digest: move the boids and output their now position

method.name: /point/number
method.description: set the number of boids.
method.digest: set number of boids

method.name: /neighbors/number
method.description: set the number of neighbors each boid consults when flocking.
method.digest: set number of neighbors

method.name: /maxspeed
method.description: set the maximum speed of speed range.
method.digest: set maximum speed

method.name: /minspeed
method.description: set the minimum speed of speed range.
method.digest: set minimum speed

method.name: /center
method.description: set the strength of centering instinct.
method.digest: set strength of centering

method.name: /attract
method.description: set the strength of attraction to point.
method.digest: set strength of attraction

method.name: /match
method.description: set the strength of neighbor speed matching instinct.
method.digest: set the strength of neighbor speed matching instinct

method.name: /avoid
method.description: set the strength of neighbor avoidance instinct.
method.digest: set the strength of neighbor avoidance instinct

method.name: /repel
method.description: set the strengh of wall avoidance instinct.
method.digest: set the strengh of wall avoidance instinct

method.name: /edgedist
method.description: set the distance of vision for avoiding wall edges.
method.digest: set the distance of vision for avoiding wall edges

method.name: /speed
method.description: set the overall speed.
method.digest: set the overall speed

method.name: /inertia
method.description: set the willingness to change speed and direction.
method.digest: set the willingness to change speed and direction

method.name: /accel
method.description: set the speed of acceleration.
method.digest: set the speed of acceleration

method.name: /prefdist
method.description: set the preferred distance from neighbors.
method.digest: set the preferred distance from neighbors

method.name: /flyrect
method.description: set the bounding box (walls) in which to fly (xmin/xmax/ymin/ymax/zmin/zmax).
method.digest: set the bounding box (walls) in which to fly (xmin/xmax/ymin/ymax/zmin/zmax)

method.name: /attract/xyz
method.description: set the point to which boids are attracted.
method.digest: set the point to which boids are attracted

method.name: /reset
method.description: reset boids randomly inside the flyrect.
method.digest: reset boids randomly inside the flyrect

method.name: /point/[index]/speed
method.description: set speed for the i-th boid.
method.digest: set speed for the i-th boid

method.name: /point/[index]/speed/inverse
method.description: inverse speed for the i-th boid.
method.digest: inverse speed for the i-th boid

method.name: /point/[index]/direction/xyz
method.description: set direction for the i-th boid.
method.digest: set direction for the i-th boid

method.name: /point/[index]/position/xyz
method.description: set position for the i-th boid.
method.digest: set position for the i-th boid
